text: Xudo ʙa kasone az sumo, ki imon ovardaand va korhoe soista kardaand, va'da dod, ki dar rui zamin conisini digaronason kunad, hamcunon, ki mardumero, ki pes az onho ʙudand, conisini digaron kard, Va dinasonro, ki xud ʙarojason pisandida ast, ustuvor sozad. Va vahsatasonro ʙa tinci ivaz kunad. Maro meparastand va hec cizero ʙo Man sarik namekunand. Va onho, ki az in pas nosukri kunand, nofarmonand
